page.title: 17 Sports
page.content: The Bow Brickhill Cricket Club won the Milton Keynes and District Cricket League Division Two Championship.The Football Club ended the 1984/85 season on a high note winning the Brickhills cup, beating Little Brickhill 2-1 in the final. The Woburn golfcourse is well used and there have been several major championships held there including a past Dunhill Masters Championship, Ford ladies and a Pro-Celebrity Tournament which was held on 16th October 1985.There are two courses one of which is a championship course.The latter is called the Dukes course and the other course being known as the Duchess course.These were named after the Duke and Duchess of Bedford who lived nearby.The Bow Brickhill show on the 26th August 1985 featured It's a knockout.
